scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.test:e2e: echo 'Start servers with npm run dev first, then run npm run test:e2e:local'
scripts.test:e2e:ci: (cd server && npm run dev) & (cd client && npm run dev) & sleep 10 && npx wait-on -v http://localhost:5000 http://localhost:3000 --timeout 120000 && npx playwright test
scripts.test:e2e:ui: echo 'Start servers with npm run dev first, then run npm run test:e2e:ui:local'
scripts.test:all: npm run test && echo 'For e2e tests: start servers with npm run dev, then run npm run test:e2e:local'
